item.title: Built with Hugo
item.description:
This site is built with Hugo, a static site generator. Technically, this means that viewing the site requires nothing more than serving the pages, because these are static pages, generated beforehand.

Practically, this means that all development and writing is done on my local machine and I upload the generated site / content to a server when ready.

Most notably, I no longer need a webhost with advanced capabilities. All it must do is serve static pages.

I could use GitHub Pages or 50 Webs or any other free hosting service, without ever needing to upgrade.

Other benefits include writing content using markdown on my own computer, using the software I prefer. No mucking about with web based content editors.

Take a look and the Hugo documentation for how to get started.
